document_data.name: Forthar Helvenstron
document_data.mainbody: '''Forthar Helvenstron''' was a [[Zhentilar]] commander involved in the [[Zhent]] invasion of [[Shadowdale]] in [[1375 DR]].
document_data.History:
Forthar was a Zhentilar commander who was part of the [[Zhentarim Occupation Army]] in Shadowdale in 1375 DR.

When the fighting in the dale increased, he gathered as many villagers as possible. In order to terrify the population, his plan was to slaughter them all in the debased [[Shrine of Mystra (Shadowdale)|Shrine of Mystra]]. However, his troops were attacked at the bridge on the [[River Ashaba]] by some adventurers and he was killed.
